name: Stillness and Rage
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You take control of the wind in a 60 foot radius around you, which stays centered on you as you move. Now and at the start of each of your turns, choose one of the following effects:
>Everything is unnaturally still. Sound does not carry. Everything in range is silenced.
>Winds rampage all around you. Everything in range is deafened, and your Wind spells that deal damage deal 2 additional damage per die rolled.
>Winds echo everything they catch. Every single action and word that makes noise within the radius is heard by everything within range.
